p: Extracts and essential oil from S. montana herb possess antibacterial, antiviral, antioxidant, anticatarrhal, antitumor, stimulant, expectorant, and other pharmacological activities [ 4, 5, 6, 8, 10]. Essential oils of many Satureja species contain oxygenates terpenes. Among them are thymol and carvacrol, which are the indicators of antimicrobial activity [ 5, 6]. Due to such biological activities, S. montana could be regarded as a promising source for the manufacture of food products with antioxidant effects and herbal preparations with antimicrobial and antioxidant activities [ 5].
